additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
192 mana, 0.8 mana regeneration and 1.6% flat base magic resistance.
22.4 main attack damage to universal heroes.
name: Kaya and Sange
description: Two of three known items of unimaginable power that many believe were crafted at the same enchanter's forge.
tips: Much like Sange and Yasha, this is a cost-effective item that greatly increases a spellcaster's mid-game presence.
May be purchased if one wishes to start fighting earlier and establish control.
